price: 6 De même, ceux qui renient leur Seigneur sont voués aux tourments de la Géhenne. Et quelle horrible demeure !
arabic: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِرَبِّهِمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walilladhīna kafarū birabbihim ʿadhābu jahannama wabi'sa al-maṣīru
